title: Festival Ambush
tagline: in which the Festival of Rebirth is marred by a gnoll attack
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship prepares for their journey, amidst growing concerns of evil in the wilds and an influx of refugees.
The adventurers complete various errands, with Seeker assisting in fortifying a temple and Riswynn Brawnanvil joining the party.
The Festival of Rebirth features a dramatic burning of a tree-shrine, symbolizing renewal, but is unexpectedly followed by a somber procession.
A gnoll attack disrupts the festival, leading to a fierce battle where the party prevails but Kenzo is seriously injured.
The Fellowship plans to depart Karawa the following morning, as the town prepares to flee westward.
short_summary: During the Festival of Rebirth in Karawa, the Dunmar Fellowship repels a gnoll attack before planning their northward departure.
